医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
年龄、教育和宗教影响尼日利亚老年人的抑郁风险研究表明，孤独和缺乏身体活动是尼日利亚老年人抑郁的关键因素，强调了社交互动的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Age-education-and-religion-impact-depression-risk-among-Nigerian-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Age-education-and-religion-impact-depression-risk-among-Nigerian-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a041a07-4345-424c-906b-7cd548afec8a Fri, 08 Nov 2024 05:11:00 -0500 Age, education, and religion impact depression risk among Nigerian older adults

了解慢加急性肝衰竭的代谢改变和免疫功能障碍慢性肝衰竭（ACLF）是一种危及生命的疾病，其特征是患有慢性肝病的患者肝功能急剧恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Understanding-metabolic-alterations-and-immune-dysfunction-in-acute-on-chronic-liver-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Understanding-metabolic-alterations-and-immune-dysfunction-in-acute-on-chronic-liver-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0d57d70-3c75-4b55-af9f-e7d31836a9bf Fri, 08 Nov 2024 00:18:00 -0500 Understanding metabolic alterations and immune dysfunction in acute-on-chronic liver failure
人工智能和成像技术改变胰腺癌诊断胰腺癌（PC）由于其侵袭性和缺乏早期症状而面临巨大的诊断挑战，导致发现较晚且预后不良。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/AI-and-imaging-technologies-transform-pancreatic-cancer-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/AI-and-imaging-technologies-transform-pancreatic-cancer-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5bc795a-a7ef-4cf1-8a18-83dc66b76e94 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 00:10:22 -0500 AI and imaging technologies transform pancreatic cancer diagnostics
新研究揭示了线粒体在乳腺癌转移中的作用线粒体长期以来一直被认为是微小的细胞器，它充当我们细胞内的电池组，同时也充当内部传感器和通信器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-research-unravels-mitochondrias-role-in-breast-cancer-metastasis-Collaborati.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-research-unravels-mitochondrias-role-in-breast-cancer-metastasis-Collaborati.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a51b864a-fe98-49ff-ae6e-352a1c4e7366 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:58:00 -0500 New research unravels mitochondria's role in breast cancer metastasis
治疗慢性阻塞性肺病的新方法侧重于社会经济因素和合并症一篇新文章称，治疗慢性阻塞性肺病患者的医疗保健提供者还需要关注患者的社会经济因素，同时考虑他们的其他健康状况或合并症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-approach-to-COPD-focuses-on-socioeconomic-factors-and-comorbidities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-approach-to-COPD-focuses-on-socioeconomic-factors-and-comorbidities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00941bad-d259-417d-9c93-94d5e2fdb22a Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:56:00 -0500 New approach to COPD focuses on socioeconomic factors and comorbidities
Adipo Therapeutics 分享潜在肥胖治疗的研究结果Adipo Therapeutics LLC 是一家后期临床前生物制药公司，正在开发一种治疗肥胖和相关代谢紊乱的潜在疗法，该公司在圣安东尼奥肥胖协会年会上展示了两项研究的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Adipo-Therapeutics-shares-results-of-studies-on-pottial-obesity-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Adipo-Therapeutics-shares-results-of-studies-on-pottial-obesity-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e0a8d0d-2d45-4b8a-bdfe-0539212d2aee Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:19:32 -0500 Adipo Therapeutics shares results of studies on potential obesity treatment
新的机器人系统可以彻底改变多部位病症的治疗临床实践中，多个疾病部位很常见。例如，在大脑中，血管阻塞会导致中风，缺氧会迅速损害脑细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-robotic-system-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-multi-site-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-robotic-system-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-multi-site-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e401b5e-4ad6-4171-8eaa-272c41c9be82 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:15:52 -0500 New robotic system could revolutionize treatment of multi-site conditions
季节性流感在 COVID-19 大流行期间适应并演变一项新的研究表明，尽管 COVID-19 大流行期间的旅行限制和社会措施导致全球季节性流感病例大幅下降，但特定地区的某些流感谱系使病毒继续传播和进化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Seasonal-influenza-adapted-and-evolved-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Seasonal-influenza-adapted-and-evolved-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c957f75-ed64-4b2f-96fc-a1085024bf6c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:05:28 -0500 Seasonal influenza adapted and evolved during the COVID-19 pandemic
调查显示肯塔基州学龄前儿童的蛀牙率令人震惊肯塔基大学牙科学院的 2023 年肯塔基州早期学习者口腔健康监测项目调查发现，肯塔基州 2 至 5 岁儿童的蛀牙率明显高于全国平均水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Survey-reveals-alarming-dental-decay-rates-in-Kentucky-preschoolers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Survey-reveals-alarming-dental-decay-rates-in-Kentucky-preschoolers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1eef7f0-1bd5-46ee-8efc-cbbc6beb0660 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 23:00:03 -0500 Survey reveals alarming dental decay rates in Kentucky preschoolers
